title: A Wild Swan Attacked by a Dog

thumbnail.alt_text: A work made of brush and gray wash and black gouache, heightened with lead white (discolored), on blue laid paper (faded), laid down on cream board.

medium_display: Brush and gray wash and black gouache, heightened with lead white (discolored), on blue laid paper (faded), laid down on cream board
credit_line: Purchased with funds provided by the Joseph and Helen Regenstein Foundation
publication_history:
Marquis de Chennevières, Les Dessins de Maîtres Anciens Exposés à l'Ecole des Beaux-Arts en 1879 (Paris, 1880), p. 99.

Edmond de Goncourt, I (1881), p. 130.

Jean Locquin, "Catalogue Raisonné de l'Oeuvre de Jean-Baptiste Oudry," Archives de l'Art Français, VI (1912), no. 614.

Jean Vergnet-Ruiz, "Oudry," Les Peintres Français du XVIIIe Siècle (Paris, 1930), no. 54.

H. N. Opperman, "Some Animal Drawings by Jean-Baptiste Oudry," Master Drawings, IV (1966), pl. 25.

Art Quarterly, XXIX (1966), p. 294 (ill.).

Chronique des Arts, 151 (February 1967), p. 86 (ill.).

H. N. Opperman, Jean-Baptiste Oudry (London, 1977), no. D628 (ill.).

Harold Joachim, French Drawings and Sketchbooks of the Eighteenth Century in The Art Institute of Chicago (Chicago, 1979), no. 2D3.
exhibition_history:
Paris, "Tableaux et Dessins de l'Ecole Français," 1860, cat. 284.

Paris, Ecole des Beaux-Arts, "Dessins de Maîtres Anciens," 1879, cat. 489.

Paris, Gazette des Beaux-Arts, "Exposition Goncourt," 1933, cat. 238.

Stockholm, Nationalmuseum, "Fem Sekler Fransk Konst," August 15-November 9, 1958, cat. 238.

New York, Charles Slatkin Gallery, "Selected Drawings," 1966, cat. 22.

The Art Institute of Chicago, "The Helen Regenstein Collection of European Drawings," 1974, pp. 78-79, cat. 38 (ill.), cat. by Harold Joachim.

The Art Institute of Chicago, "Selected Works of 18th Century French Art in the Collections of The Art Institute of Chicago," January 24-March 28, 1976, pp. 46-47, cat. 32 (ill.).

Paris, Musée du Louvre, "Dessins français de l’Art Institute de Chicago de Watteau à Picasso," October 15, 1976-January 17, 1977, n.p., cat. 4 (ill.).

Frankfurt am Main, Germany, Städtische Galerie im Städelschen Kunstinstitut, "Französische Zeichnungen aus dem Art Institute of Chicago," February 10-April 10, 1977, pp. 18-19, cat. 4 (ill.).

Paris, Galeries Nationales du Grand Palais, "Jean-Baptiste Oudry," October 1, 1982-January 3, 1983, cat. 105.
provenance_text: Edmond and Jules de Goncourt [Lugt 1089]; sold, Hôtel Drouot, Paris, February 15-17, 1897, de Goncourt sale, lot 106, to the Marquise de la Ferronays [according to Paris 1982]. Marquise de la Ferronays (died 1946), to at least 1933 [Paris 1933].  Private collection, by 1958 [Stockholm 1958].  Sold, Galerie Charpentier, Paris, June 3-4, 1958, Anonymous sale, lot 48.  Sold by Charles Slatkin Gallery, New York, to the Art Institute, 1966.

input: A Wild Swan Attacked by a Dog
